resources.string:
Select the option that corresponds how often you have been bothered by the following over the past two weeks. 
 
0: Not at all 
1: Several days 
2: More than half the days 
3: Nearly every day
Insert the question here. Insert the question here.
You are on question 1 on n.
You are on question 2 on n.
You are on question 3 on n.
This seems like a good place to include some explanatory text about the app/surveys.
You are taking the GAD-7 and PHQ-9 anxiety and depression screener tests.
Oh I hope this page can sum the results
